data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Spinonychiurus Weiner 1996 (Collembola: Onychiuridae) with description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pomorski, Romuald J., Kapruś, Igor J. (2015): Revision of the genus Spinonychiurus Weiner 1996 (Collembola: Onychiuridae) with description of five new species. Zootaxa 3914 (2): 101-121, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3914.2.1
